author: potuz
content: Are there client teams blog posts for Glamsterdam already out? It'd be nice if they are added to Tim's ethmag forum post to collect them all there. Even better if we can add the links to the first post in that thread

author: timbeiko
content: I updated the agenda for ACDE, including some rough Fusaka timelines based on the upgrade deployment process we discussed post-Pectra. It would be good for all teams to review this ahead of time so that we can understand how realistic such a timeline is for everyone: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1610
